38namespace TCLAP {
39const char PATH_SEPARATOR =
40#ifdef _WIN32
41 '\\';
42#else
43 '/';
44#endif
45
46class CmdLineInterface;
47class ArgException;
48
52class CmdLineOutput {
53public:
57 virtual ~CmdLineOutput() {}
58
63 virtual void usage(CmdLineInterface &c) = 0;
64
69 virtual void version(CmdLineInterface &c) = 0;
70
76 virtual void failure(CmdLineInterface &c, ArgException &e) = 0;
77};
78
79inline bool isInArgGroup(const Arg *arg, const std::list<ArgGroup *> &argSets) {
80 for (std::list<ArgGroup *>::const_iterator it = argSets.begin();
81 it != argSets.end(); ++it) {
82 if (std::find((*it)->begin(), (*it)->end(), arg) != (*it)->end()) {
83 return true;
84 }
85 }
86 return false;
87}
88
89inline void removeArgsInArgGroups(std::list<Arg *> &argList,
90 const std::list<ArgGroup *> &argSets) {
91 for (std::list<Arg *>::iterator it = argList.begin();
92 it != argList.end();) {
93 if (isInArgGroup(*it, argSets)) {
94 it = argList.erase(it);
95 } else {
96 ++it;
97 }
98 }
99}
100
101inline std::string removeSuffix(std::string s, const std::string &suffix) {
102 std::ptrdiff_t start = s.length() - suffix.length();
103 if (start >= 0 && s.substr(start) == suffix) {
104 return s.substr(0, start);
105 }
106
107 return s;
108}
109
110inline std::string basename(std::string s) {
111 size_t p = s.find_last_of(PATH_SEPARATOR);
112 if (p != std::string::npos) {
113 s.erase(0, p + 1);
114 }
115
116 return removeSuffix(s, ".exe");
117}
118
119} // namespace TCLAP
